products.title: Splash Snow White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Snow White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room.  Splash Snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens or high traffic areas. Panel blinds are our best choice for big windows and our go-to recommendation for french windows and patio doors.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0263 Fabric Colour: Snow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Paper White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Paper White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Paper White Panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space.  This off-white dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This white panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0280 Fabric Colour: Paper Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Frost White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Frost White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This White panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and white fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. 
 
One of the largest blinds we make, our panel blinds stretch to a massive five metres width and three and a half metres drop.  This makes panel blinds perfect for covering large windows that stretch the property, or conservatory windows and patio doors.  Another great alternative, is to use panel blinds as room divider, a unique and stylish way to divide space.  
 
Our panel blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0242 Fabric Colour: Frost Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Frost
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Frost Standard Panel Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Panel Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 600mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 450mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: Wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: Robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: Top fix or face fix brackets.
